coreAttributes.authorTag: 'Enchanted & produced by XRC' is printed on the edge of the wrapper.
coreAttributes.name: arcane bandage
coreAttributes.description: A generic adhesive bandage enchanted to revitalize the wearer and assist in closing wounds. According to the packaging, this brand is 'probably safe.'

useDescriptions.selfUse:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] an arcane bandage from its wrapper and to apply it to [npc.herself].

Once the bandage is applied, you feel a soothing wave of energy flow into your body.
useDescriptions.otherUse:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] an arcane bandage from its wrapper and [npc.verb(apply)] it to [npc2.NameIs] face.

Once the bandage is applied, [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(feel)] a soothing wave of energy flow into [npc2.her] body.
